title: Large Pit
content: Large Pit This is a large, elongated pit, with a high roof. Ragged fringes of white mineral hang from the ceiling, and you can hear water rushing in the distance. The ground is worn into polished flowing curves. A twisty crawl runs left, a tunnel goes right, and a wide tunnel ascends. You shake your head, side to side, trying to push off the weight of weariness for another few minutes. Keep moving.
